title.rendered: OEM Samsung Original EP-TA200EWE Charger + Cable EP-DR140AWE (5V-2A, 9V-1.67A) – for Galaxy S10, S10+, S10e, S9, S9…

content.rendered:
Original Samsung EP-TA20EWE 15W White Fast Charger EU Presentation Includes Type C Cable White The OEM Samsung model ensures that the very best requirements have been adhered to throughout the manufacturing course of to make sure a superb buyer expertise.

Make certain this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
Input: 100-240V 0.5A
Output: 5.0V-2.0A or 9V-1.67A
The product comes with the charger EP-TA200EWE + cable EP-DR140AWE and each are proven in bulk format.
Compatible gadgets: Galaxy S10 (SM-G9730), Galaxy S10+ (SM-G9750), Galaxy S10e (SM-G9700), Galaxy S9 (G9600), Galaxy S9, S9+ (Plus) (G9650)
Plug sort: USB
